original_text: For he bringeth down them that dwell on high; the lofty city, he layeth it low; he layeth it low, even to the ground; he bringeth it even to the dust.
korean_text: 높은 데에 거주하는 자를 낮추시며 솟은 성을 헐어 땅에 엎으시되 진토에 미치게 하셨도다

sentences.original_text: For he bringeth down them that dwell on high
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 높은 곳에 거하는 자들을 낮추시나니

sentences.original_text: lofty city, he layeth it low
he layeth it low, even to the ground
he bringeth it even to the dust
